website_summaries.verdict: Great features, versatility, and performance for the money.
pros: We love the versatility of this machine as it will cook pizzas, quiches, quesadillas, and more
cons: Tends to overcook until you get used to it
Cooking plates cannot be removed for cleaning, but they are nonstick

website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that quickly cooks pizzas up to 12 inches, as well as a variety of other foods.
pros: Works well for pizza and other foods such as quesadillas, frittatas, flat breads, and cookies
Oven heats up in about five minutes, while pizzas take 10 minutes to cook
cons: Some complaints of uneven cooking, where the bottom cooks faster than the top
No on or off switch or temperature control, just a cord that plugs in
Some buyers report that this option stops working after several months

website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the pizza in the name fool you, because this multi-purpose appliance can also prepare large quesadillas stuffed full of your favorite meats, cheeses, and veggies.
pros: Has a 12 inch cook surface that's perfect for making large quesadillas
Flexible hinge allows you to pile in the ingredients
Versatile, as it's also designed to make pizzas, omelettes, nachos, and more
cons: Heats faster on the bottom than the top, causing uneven results
Some owners voiced longevity concerns after their units quit working after several weeks/months of use

customer_reviews.title: This only lasts about 6 months before it stops working.
customer_reviews.text: I have a love/ hate relationship with this product. I LOVE cooking with it! Unlimited ways to use it and saves heating up the whole house by using the big oven. We cook anything from omelets, to grilled cheese, to homemade pizza, to chicken nuggets and on and on! The reason I HATE it, is because they only last roughly 6 months before they stop working. This is the second one I've purchased and they both did the same thing. I'm going to have to try a different product but I'm sad because I really love this one if it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia O. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: it is perfect i like a lot I made turkish lahmacun make exactly what I want it. I make naan today and it is fantastic do not search anymore buy this one. thank you
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great for pizza.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. We buy large fresh pizza at Sams, and cut them into eight pieces, We put 2 uncooked slices in zipper bags. To bake in my range at 375 degrees takes 22 minutes & I have to heat the entire oven for 2 pieces of pizza. This pizza makers takes 11 minutes. The crust comes out much better than in the oven & we can get it done faster with less electricity & less heating the house in the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Pizza's come out perfect & we've also made cookies so far & they turned out yummy. Cookies cook very quickly. We did have an issue with the 1st one we ordered, it came smashed to pieces but as Amazon always does they took care of us & 2 days later, on a Sunday our replacement arrived. Tomorrow we will try omelettes :) The customer service representative was really great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy so far with everything
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy so far with everything. This is my second one in a year........the first one broke after about 8 months. I'm hoping that this one lasts longer ! Excellent for frozen pizza and also very good for eggs, bacon, ham, grilled cheese, calamari, chicken wings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Paul 2537

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: this product is a waste if money, DO NOT BUY, It has an area where it burns all the pizza and the top is not cooked. I tried to cook just the dough and tomato sauce and got same result: bottom burned, top uncooked. There is no temperature control at all. We are professional pizza chefs.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Pascu

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: I went to a pizza party, and the host was bragging about his electric pizza maker, which was about this size, but he said cost him $200. I thought that was a lot. For the $30 or so bucks this cost, I figured I'd give it a try, as I did not want to spend very much to make an occasional homemade pizza. But I must say whenever I tried, and used my conventional oven, the dough just was never cooked enough. So this arrived promptly and really does a fine job. It's simple, easy to wipe the surface clean after use, and cooks the dough nice and crispy. It's hard to go wrong at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jalonen

customer_reviews.title: cooks the bottom of the pizza to fast and if ...
customer_reviews.text: cooks the bottom of the pizza to fast and if you cook so top part is done bottom is so hard you can hardly bite through it
customer_reviews.author: James Benbow

customer_reviews.title: I dig it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. It’s really convenient to cook with and easy to clean. It’s definitely not just for pizza. I throw frozen shredded hash browns on there and they cook up really fast. No oil needed, though I add a little butter for taste. Also make quesadillas, grilled cheese, hamburgers, etc. I’m using it much more than I thought I would. For clean up, just wipe it out with a warm washcloth or paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews - you definitely need to run it for a while BEFORE YOU PUT FOOD IN IT because there is definitely a horrible chemical smell that needs to burn off before you actually cook with it. If you don't run it until the smell is totally gone, it will make your food taste bad. BUT .. once you get past that initial issue it works well for both papa john medium pizzas and frozen pizzas. It is easy to clean and easy to use. Haven't tried anything other than pizza in it but we do use it regularly for pizza as we do not have an oven where we keep it.
customer_reviews.author: heather glover

customer_reviews.title: We were only able to use it once. It ...
customer_reviews.text: We were only able to use it once. It sparked a fire in the back of the unit the second time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Micheline

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was originally looking for a quesadilla maker but this does that plus so much more! I’ve made cookies, quesadillas, and pizza in it so far and they turn out great! Once I figure out the right time for everything, I keep track in the recipe book it comes with. Quesadillas take 6min! I use parchment paper so it’s easy to lift out and keeps the griddle area clean. It only takes about 5 minutes to heat up! And once I’m done and it cools down I just wipe it out and done!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime: 6 month
customer_reviews.text: After 6 month of use (4 times per week), it doesn't work anymore due to a big spark. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ramon atencio

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 17 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk that STOPPED WORKING AT 17 MONTHS. Very disappointing. We were reasonably EXPECTING SEVERAL YEARS of use. Amazon should stop selling this crap or replace the item as good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: NYorker

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product however we are extremely disappointed as this is the second one that breaks after two months
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I highly recomment this pizza maker...!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product....I could never end up with a pizza like this from the oven. I make dough in my bread machine and hand press it out in maker. Add my ingredients and then plug it in. I'd preheat if I was making a frozen pizza. Almost no need to clean beyond a wipe with a paper towel. Sometimes I add a little oil to the towel...
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Baught this to make quesadillas and it does a splendid job. The giant cookies and pizzas are a nice bonus. There is a terrific pizza crust recipe included in the recipes that came with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: SUCH A WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: it came in defective, but it was able to function after a couple tries even though the light was never on, but after using it for a month it completely shut down, the pan will not heat up or response at all. SUCH A WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about seven months with infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about seven months with usage averaging once a week. Looks like the "ready indicator" continuously suggests the oven is ready, but no heat is being generated.
customer_reviews.author: Jerad

customer_reviews.title: "CHEESE IT UP @ HOME"
customer_reviews.text: COOKING WITH THIS MACHINE IS A FUN EXPERIENCE. IT QUICKLY PREHEATS TO JUST THE RIGHT TEMP. INCLUDED IS A PIZZA CRUST RECIPE. THE NON-SICK SURFACE IS A QUICK & EASY CLEAN UP. TOP YOUR PIZZA WITH ALL YOUR FAVORITE INGREDIENTS. DON'T FORGET TO "CHEESE IT UP!" WITHIN 12 MINUTES YOU WILL OPEN THE LID & BE AMAZED AT YOUR FINDINGS, A PERFECTLY COOKED PIZZA AS GOOD AS IT GETS. PRACTICE A FEW RECIPES TO PERFECT THE CRUST TEXTURE. DON'T FORGET TO INCLUDE A NICE PIZZA SAUCE TO PREVENT DRYNESS. THE SHAPE OF THE UNIT MAKES IT EASY TO STORE IN AN UPRIGHT POSITION. IT PRODUCES A PIZZA THAT WOULD EASILY FEED 2-3 PEOPLE. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THE PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Lindalou

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient heat
customer_reviews.text: The unit did not heat food all the way through. I always had to finish pizzas in the broiler to melt the cheese on top.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great  breakfast making
customer_reviews.text: While I have not yet used it to make pizza, This pizza maker is awesome! I use it regularly to make pancakes, bacon n eggs and fried potatoes and sausages! I close the lid briefly to cook the top of the eggs so no flipping needed. The unit does get hot but I just unplug and leave it cool a bit. Wipes clean easily with paper towels. I wish it had an on/off switch and something to keep it closed for storage but I took care of that by wrapping a huge elastic band around the front edge so I can store upright. This is One of my Frequently used appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: If you see this thing on the counter then you know it's Friday night
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for frozen pizzas. I've made grilled cheese, corn dogs, and frozen waffles in this appliance. Both top and bottom heat so cooking is very even. I don't think I've ever done anything other than wipe it with a paper towel to clean it. Nothing sticks to it. Why turn on the oven for a corn dog or two? Microwaves don't work for everything. Caution when opening it when pizza is done - the steam from inside is HOT so wear an oven mit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pizza has a nice, crispy brown crust.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pizza cooker! You will need to put some water in it and plug it in outside when you first get it. This releases a very strong chemical-infused smoke and prevents your first pizza from tasting awful. I repeated twice before using. Also, you will find that the bottom cooks faster than the top and then there is the dilemma about how to get a limp, fresh pizza into a hot cooker. Cook the pizza on parchment paper to give the top time to cook. The bottom will still get brown. You can make the pizza on the paper and then lift it, paper and all, into the oven. Perfecto.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas John Bradway

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Agitated and disappointed. Unfortunately I am receiving a replacement. When I hit the Drop off at UPS, the replacement box was already checked which I did NOT expect. I thought I’d have a choice. Now I ll have to return the a second pizza maker. I can’t undo the replacement or contact Customer Service. Cooks too hot!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia O.

customer_reviews.title: BC Pizza Maker
customer_reviews.text: I love using this pizza maker, it can do so much more. Clean up is a breeze and to really save any clean up you can use parchment paper. I baked cinnamon rolls and had NO mess to clean up since I used parchment paper, which is reuse able so once and done isn't the case. I highly recommend this little pizza maker, though it isn't all the small but worth having anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Catz Meow

customer_reviews.title: We love this product for simplicity and eliminating using the oven in our summer heat wave.
customer_reviews.text: This Betty Crocker product is simple and compact for what it does. All you do is place a store frozen 12" diameter pizza inside, close the lid and let it heat for 15 minutes. Doctor up your pizza to your desire of toppings. I recommend getting a four cheese store pizza so you can add fresh veggies or meat. The result will really please all your senses. The pizza comes out with a crunchy chew, hot and fresh taste and totally pleases the user who just saved power by just operating a small appliance and saves your ac from having to work harder to keep up with the heat expelled from a hot oven. An enjoyable surprise awaits you!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Best way I've come across to cook a pizza.
customer_reviews.text: Love it but you have to keep an eye on it or your food will burn baby burn. Pizzas, biscuits and cinnamon rolls are what I cook in it. I haven't had th he guys to try anything else for fear it might go up in flames. It's a hot little cooker. Crisps up the bottom of the pizza really well. Gets the job done. I really like it. UPDATE: I've fried potatoes, hamburgers, grilled cheese sandwiches and even cooked bacon. I love this damn thing.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Helton

customer_reviews.title: DoA straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this item. Reviews were great it appeared very well made. It just arrived 45 minutes ago. After a quick wipe off, deiced to use it to bake a pizza, as it was highly recommended by the other customers. Unfortunately device didn't turn on, I contacted with toll-free number listed in the user manual, after a very fast troubleshooting, customer service advised me to return it back to Amazon for a replacement. I decided to return it for a refund. I wasn't impressed with the quality of this item. It looks very cheaply made and fairly plasticky, also in person it look much smaller than the photos. Sadly I couldn't even bake anything on it.
customer_reviews.author: MTEO

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity + Functionality = Great
customer_reviews.text: I've made just about everything I can think of in this thing (while being practical) and I would consider this a must have. Pizza out of here is way better than from the oven along with every other food I've cooked with this. From jalapeño poppers to cinnamon rolls, it really brings out the full flavor by cooking so evenly. The surface has stayed non-stick and it cleans easily with just a paper towel. I wouldn't recommend much else if you want the surface coating to last forever. - Well worth the money and if it broke I'd buy another in a heartbeat but, I see no reason why it won't last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than 10 times usage in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before placing the order to buy this pizza maker. Yes, there are some negative reviews about short lifetime complaints. I thought it might be just bad luck. Unfortunately, it happens to me, too. I got this product in April, 2020. I like it at the beginning. But just after few times use, it doesn’t work anymore. The two lights indicators are both continuously on after plugging in. But no heat is being generated. This is a piece of junk. It requires to send to Canada to return for service. It is too much hassle. It’s a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: John Maynes

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this pizza oven for Christmas. Initially, I loved it, made great, crisp delicious pizza. However, now, 6 months later, after using it 5 times since then, as you can see by the photo, the ceramic lid completely separated from the heating element!! So dangerous! Thank god it had cooled when it happened. All I did was open it normally to wipe it clean. It completely fell apart. Two, small, pitiful screws came out of the hinge. Such a disappointment. I wouldn't buy another one. Not safe!!
customer_reviews.author: MellyMel

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget for more than just pizza
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. You can make pizza or cookies.. you can reheat your leftovers. I warmed up empanadas flip them over every 7 minutes and the outside was crispy. You can cook so much more i like to experiment.. the only thing is the hot plates don't come off to clean so I wipe them down right away after cooking. I like it and have fun using it!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppie Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite friend!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I finally made pizza in it, so i feel i can review it. But I've used it for so many things. Warming up frozen pizza, fries, falafel. Toasting bread and cheese. Making pancakes. It's very easy to use. Just plug it in. That's it. Very easy clean up. Biggest con is the super short wire.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves This
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because we bake a lot of pizzas, but we get drips in the oven and they are annoying to clean up. This makes pizzas quickly, and we’ve also been making quesadillas with it. I know he’ll be making a lot of other things with it because he is using it every other day or so. I will probably add more details after asking my husband some more questions about the features he likes best. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Aud Reads

customer_reviews.title: Very good... could be updated!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this! Besides pizza, I use it for pancakes, heating tortillas, quesadillas, reheating leftovers. I have no idea why the top stays loose... Wish it had temperature control!
customer_reviews.author: GQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and you can do more than pizza, but don't think you can put frozen items in this device and it will cook them like a real oven. The pizza maker heats up very hot, but if you put frozen items in it they will absorb the heat and won't cook. No Pizza maker is designed to do that. Defrost any frozen items first or use fresh made deli pizzas or pizza dough or tortillas and your favorite items. Also makes Sunny side up eggs great.
customer_reviews.author: rockofsicily

customer_reviews.title: Performs as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product on a whim, and was pleasantly surprised! It heats up in no time and cooks the pizza crust evenly. Using this is much faster than an oven. My only complaint would be the initial smell during first-time use. Have not tried it to make other items such as quesadillas, but can't wait to try these next.
customer_reviews.author: JustaReview12222

customer_reviews.title: Burned the bottom of the food
customer_reviews.text: We are sheltering in place at home so I thought it would be fun to use this pizza maker to cook up goodies. Well, despite the great reviews this is a no go for us. It was burning the bottom of our frozen pizzas and buns and not cooking the top. I then purchased a pack of parchment papers hoping to solve the problem. Nope. Maybe I received a defective pizza maker. I read through the bad reviews and I saw that some others had the same problem. I returned to amazon but now I’m stuck w the parchment paper rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hash brown potatoes but great for pizza
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to cook hash brown potatoes. The so-called non stick pans are not, and they stick. They cook only ok on this unit, and one must turn them over to brown the other side. I need to refine my technique. However, a small pizza I made came out beautifully.. It was small (and square which I like) but the fresh crust was crispy and everything was cooked (I parboil the peppers and onions). So, I guess this unit is a success as such. Four stars for no temperature gauge and shut off.
customer_reviews.author: MadMax

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Deni pizza cooker that I used for years and was devastated when it stopped working as they aren’t made any longer. While this does not have a removable pizza pan or adjustable temperature control as the Deni did...this unit makes a better pizza. In fact, I’ve never had such a crispy pizza in my life. I’ve cooked other items in it as well. Since you cannot adjust the temperature you have to watch it closely. I plan to buy another so I can make two pizzas at once. I need this item in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I made pizza with home made pizza dough, and with premade pizza crust, and both times turned out great. I'm sure it would work just as well for frozen pizza. I used the golden home ultra thin premade crusts, because thin crust is my favorite, and it gets nice and crispy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to make grill
customer_reviews.text: We cooked lahmacun that is Mediterranean culture food. It was so delicious. There was not any problem while we were cooking. It controls temperature, easy to clean and fit to different usage. I wrote this review 4 months later after I received it. So great so far.
customer_reviews.author: VOLKAN CAGLAR

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Already made pizza several times, and it always comes out perfect with crispy crust ( never got this so far in an oven). The only complaints is, the pizza maker has no temperature control so is just hot. Kind of very hot. So you have to keep an eye of what you’re cooking. Also, there is no handle to safely hold when checking the pizza or other food you’re heating without using hand protection ( the whole top is hot). Other than these, it’s a nice pizza maker.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Peter C

customer_reviews.title: It's...okay
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps my review is skewed as I bought it to replace my Pizzaz, which sadly broke While it does cook everything my Pizzaz did, I find it less user friendly. There is no timer. Also, you can't just slide your pizza etc off of it. You have to use a utensil to lift it up. I regret my purchase and wish I'd just paid a bit more for another Pizzaz
customer_reviews.author: tiedyemama

customer_reviews.title: must say I was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed when I plugged it in and it smoked pretty bad and made popping sounds. I was ready to send it back. I decided to give it another try. Got a do it yourself pizza kit. Put it together, 14 mins and I got a perfect mini pizza :-) So glad it didn't send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tanners Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better pizza than a home oven
customer_reviews.text: This cooks cheap frozen pizza perfectly in less time than my oven, and preheats faster to boot. It cooks very evenly, and has no problem getting the crust nice and crispy. As other reviews mention, most rising crusts should be avoided, they can burn if they touch the top surface. It's a great buy if you don't have an oven, or just don't want to heat the oven up in the summer. There's no frills or adjustments here: no temperature setting, no timer, not even an on/off switch. The temperature hasn't been an issue, but needing to unplug it to turn it off is enough of an annoyance to cost it a star.
customer_reviews.author: bakageta

customer_reviews.title: Necessary Kitchen Appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version that wasn't Betty Crocker, but it seems Betty Crocker bought out their rights and started manufacturing their own pizza oven. I love mine!! Great for pizza or any frozen food instead of using your main oven. I also use mine to toast bread and make pancakes. It's excellent at reheating leftovers, making textures crunchy again. Heats up quickly and easy to wipe clean. (Easier to clean while warm.) Absolutely essential to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Weirdcrab77

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, and I help myself to keep cleaner by using aluminum foil. Great for those frozen pizzas at the store. This does real well with the cauliflower crusts. I tried those in the oven and never got cooked right, but this device cooks them thoroughly enough that it doesn't seem soggy in places like it did with oven. Haven't tried anything else, but I would assume it would do the trick for like cookies, etc...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Crispy crust on homemade dough
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used 5 times. Been working on perfecting homemade pizza dough Make a nice brown crispy crust. Good option for not turning on oven. Arrived in perfect condition. Cleaned since it’s new. Plug in and ready to go. It makes 12” and it gets hot so be careful for steam when opening. So far have just made thin crust pizza. When i do thick crust I’ll probably bake the crust 3-5 min before adding the toppings. Great product
customer_reviews.author: DeeL

customer_reviews.title: The sellers raised the price, itis a bad machine
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this pizza maker for one month only, after the return window it stopped working with no reason whatsoever, I did not immerse it in water, it was in the same place did not move it and did not drop it. So sad to pay around $50 and use it only for a month.PLEASE, do not do my mistake; one more thing it was advertised for $29, when it was shipped they charged me $39, I should have returned it, but I needed it. Do not do my mistake
customer_reviews.author: peace winner

customer_reviews.title: You can cook just about everything in this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This Betty Crocker pizza maker is one of the best kitchen small appliance! I have warmed frozen pizza in under 5 minutes with a nice crust(not soggy); I’ve made French toast, sandwiches, even cheese pie! I love the versatility of this machine! Cleaning is a breeze, just wipe down with a paper towel. I wipe the outside with a rag sprayed with windex, and it looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: birder

customer_reviews.title: The best thing ever. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best thing I’ve ever bought for my kitchen. I use this thing for everything!! I cook frozen pizzas with it I make sandwiches toasted. I re heat pizza. I re fry fried chicken and French fries. I bake garlic bread in it. I bake Jamaican Patties. I make Quesadillas. It’s my toaster. It’s my oven. It’s everything.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Help!!!! I need New pizza maker .Nancy
customer_reviews.text: I am seeing tear and wear in this New BC pizza maker. It's only 2 months old. Hardly used . .I have a defective one!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy  kay

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! Stopped working past return window
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April. Today is Aug 24, and it's stopped heating. Past the return window. I should have known better when I received the first one completely smashed. When it did work, it took forever to cook a pizza, and never got the toppings well done how my kids like. It was great for pancakes and grilled cheese. But definitely disappointed I wasted 40 bucks on an oversized paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, compact, and really makes a nice crisp crust, which my old conventional pizza oven wouldn't do. Con: Have to be very careful when opening the lid. Steam escapes out the front and could burn your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Wis.Gardener

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, HIGH QUALITY PIZZA OVEN!! GREAT DEAL FOR THE MONEY!💜💜🙌
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT PIZZA OVEN For A Small Family!! Why go out & buy pizza if u can make your own & if u have kids have fun at the same time!! This oven is GREAT & MAKES AWESOME PIZZA!!💜 Non-Stick & Easy To Clean!! I’v never used it for anything else yet but will!! GREAT BUY FOR YOUR MONEY!!💜🙌😁 A*****
customer_reviews.author: suzy tuccillo

customer_reviews.title: EASY AND YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister, she's a chef. I was sick of all the hassle with homemade pizza in the stove. I bought her this and I decided to use it for myself one night. Super easy. Store dough, store sauce, and cheese. I close it and you can monitor the heck out of it and get it crunchy. I cannot work WORTH ANYTHING and this is so yummy and fun! BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Sunset

customer_reviews.title: All-in-one cooking
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made!!! The kids love using it to make dinner. It's easy to use and easy to clean. Breakfast lunch and dinner!! UPDATE: I ordered 2 more, had a very hard time with the shipping, but Amazon made it right!
customer_reviews.author: faigy

customer_reviews.title: Best way too cook pizza
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my son has one and when we visited, he made pizza and didn't even have to turn on the oven. we came home and ordered this and it's wonderful. I can't wait to try and make a frittata in it. Bottomline, if you want to save money and eat in, this is the fastest and easiest way to go. Oh and it's very easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE UNIT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BETTY CROCKER PIZZA MAKER, BUT USE IT FOR FROZEN FISH, VEGETABLES, CHEESE OMELETTES ETC. THE ONLY ISSUE I HAVE IS THAT IT DOES NOT HAVE A TEMPERATURE OPTION. YOU PLUG IT IN AND IT HEATS UP ALMOST IMMEDIATELY. VERY HOT. MUST USE POT HOLDERS. COOKS VERY QUICKLY TOO...SO GOOD IF YOU ARE IN A RUSH.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: nuff said
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the one that turns since I can do that a bit and it's avoiding something else to break. I liked this model since it was about the size I need and no more, where the others seem deeper. Also there are no vents around it for convection purposes, so it makes less heat in the kitchen. It makes a better way to cook pizza in the hot weather at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Eh

customer_reviews.title: Great for making pancakes
customer_reviews.text: I used this pizza maker to make pancakes, and it made it an easy task. The only drawback is that it does not have a temperature control. It only has a default temperature setting. I have to watch very carefully in order to make sure that my pancakes are done but do not burn.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I am almost certain the person who made this appliance never used it!!! the dough is burned on bottom and raw on top ...yes i used thin crust...if you left it until the cheese was brown and bubbly like instructions said ...the crust would be Black ....a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to make flatbread but was not impressed. The idea is great because operating a small appliance on my counter top is much more easier than using my oven. I received the pizza maker yesterday and made flatbread right away to give it a try. Unfortunately, it did not work as I anticipated. It made the flatbread too crispy and we almost couldn't it them. I think what caused it was the big temperature fluctuation. It might be a design flaw or just that the one I received has temperature control issues.
customer_reviews.author: JSI

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever live without this little machine??? I have made lunch and dinner for a week without turning on oven. Pizza, Pizza reheat, frozen fish for tacos, warm tortillas, grilled cheese, cinnamon rolls, French toast sticks, etc. It heats up really fast. It will do a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice so I can't speak about long-term durability, but so far this thing is EXCELLENT! Cooks pizzas to perfection -- just as good, if not better, than the restaurant quality pizza maker we had in the past, and definitely better than in the oven. Highly recommend, you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: My husbands favorite kitchen accessory
customer_reviews.text: My husbands favorite kitchen accessory! It doesn’t burn the pizza, just melts the cheese like crazy. It makes the perfect breadsticks, warms up leftovers so much nicer than the microwave, and is so fast!
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Like the color, doesn't do a good job cooking top of pizzas
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago and had forgotten that they are hard to clean. Pizza bottom burns and top doesn't cook the top of pizza. Fuzz from damp cloth or paper towel sticks to the top inside. I will never purchase one of these again and will be throwing this in the trash or taking to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny1

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pizza and Quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I've used it to reheat cold pizza, cook frozen pizza, make quesadillas, and bake biscuits. Wow! Everything cooks quickly, and the flavor is great!
customer_reviews.author: T...

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup for pizzas
customer_reviews.text: Works O.K., but does not always cook the bottom of pizzas completely. May have to move pizza around to cook the bottom. Only has one heat setting. Amazon's price with "free prime shipping" was better than eBay or Walmart. When I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: linda l-2020

customer_reviews.title: More than just Pizza
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! This thing can make pizza, cinnamon rolls, the best omelettes, dumplings, flatbreads, and more. I threw a few chicken breast in there with some wine, butter, and rosemary and it was GREAT. Go crazy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sif

customer_reviews.title: Use your imagination cook inspire your meal in this pizza maker.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used but it was in great shape. I cook more than pizza in mine including frying and baking hash browns, eggs, grilled cheese sandwiches, tater tots, quesadillas, and other things including pancakes and omelets.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: I love this Pizza Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Not only for cooking pizza but also for perfect scrambled eggs, frittata, and/or omelets. This is the only non-stick cooking tool I depend upon for making egg dishes. You might have to lift the lid to stir and flip but the result is fluffy eggs every time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: over rated
customer_reviews.text: I felt this was a bit over rated. It's a cool idea but nothing cooks evenly and it has a bad smell. 3 stars because we did use it on vacation and that was great. It warmed up our food. But as far as making food in it thats raw it just didn't work so well
customer_reviews.author: Anonynos Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I buy alot of frozen pizzas and this is the best kitchen gadget to cook a 12" frozen pizza. Plug it in wait for the green light to come then put your frozen pizza in about 10 minutes and presto best cooked pizza in town. Sorry!!! I said "Presto" (Betty Crocker) WARNING...the cooker does not have a on/off switch you have to unplug it after every use. I hung a sign by it "please unplug after every use". The top gets very hot too, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works... but its dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I play with fire semi-pro, so I am cautious by nature in the kitchen. This thing has no power levels, no settings. you plug it in, its on, you unplug it , its off. Does it cook pizza well? Yeah, it does. Which is why I am keeping it. Do NOT buy if you have small children, or clumsy people in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it trust me
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pizza cooker for about 4 months now and I can honestly say this is the best $30 I've ever spent. This thing cooks pizza in half the time an oven will and cooks it perfect Everytime. Not only can you cook pizza but I've cooked bacon, eggs, brownies, hotdogs, hot pockets, pizza rolles, french fries, and really anything you want to warm up. It had its own temperature controle keeping it at around 400°F if I remember right. I would recommend this to anyone that doesn't always have access to an oven. 10/10 LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Hate it. Pizza came out tasting like chemicals, and made me sick. Smelt like a fire was going to start in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been the BEST kitchen gadget I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This has been the BEST kitchen gadget I have ever bought. I left our quesadilla maker on the stove. My husband turned on stove and boom burned plastic. I read reviews of this and bought it. I have made pizzas frozen and fresh, biscuits, cookies, grilled chicken, hamburgers, fries which were crispy, fish, and omelets. It's a HUGE time saver!! The only thing I have found I don't like about it is I can't get the top cleaned as well as the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good some isues
customer_reviews.text: The power cord for one is way too short. Second the power and heat are not controlled. It does cook pizzas pretty good but it seems like the top does more of a steaming then cooking. Cleans pretty good, its good for omelettes.
customer_reviews.author: peter harris

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is an absolute game changer for every household. I am completely in awe of how this has changed my life as a Mom. It's versatility is astounding. It makes anything from homemade pizza to roasted vegetables and everything in between. As a working Mom having fresh homemade pizza ready in 5 minutes sharp is practically a miracle. The pizza tastes like brick oven pizza. It washes really well too. I would recommend this for every household.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: The best for teenage sons
customer_reviews.text: We love this! My 15 year old wanted it for Christmas so I got it thinking he would only rarely use it. I WAS WRONG. this is great. We make pizza pancakes, eggs, bacon, frozen chicken tenders, brownie. We will end up buying them each a new one when they go off to college. Thank you Betty Crocker for a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: BilliW

customer_reviews.title: Keep that pizza coming
customer_reviews.text: Our oven broke and we want our pizza, so I bought this. It cooks our pizzas really well, from the center to the edges. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Day Reader

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! But stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much! Horner it simply stopped working after a few months of use :(
customer_reviews.author: IE

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. Cooks a pizza quickly, fresh or frozen. I replaced a more expensive pizza maker that malfunctioned, with this unit. It works as well as the unit I replaced, at a much lower price. Happy with this pizza maker.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Frozen thick crust pizza takes11 minutes. Comes out beautiful. Very pretty bright red with a small cook book and instruction manual. Would make an excellent Christmas or Valentines gift. Please read instructions before you use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L.Baker

customer_reviews.title: Edit....pizza oven died after almost 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried a home made pizza yet...but all of the frozen ones...with added toppings and cheese have came out tasting better than cooked in the oven. Would purchase again. Edit....pizza maker died today...enjoyed for almost 4 months...now its junk. Not been beat up or abused...used maybe once a week since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Very hot and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets hot extremely quick. Works as advertise and good bang for the buck. Would be nice to have a low and a high setting, but I knew it didn’t we I purchased it so I’m not dinging it but maybe future models could at least have 2 settings. This thing will burn your food if you’re not careful. You can’t set it and forget it. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Chachie

customer_reviews.title: Food Taste Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far made quesadillas & pizza!!! Works amazingly had my little granddaughter helping she loved it! It does get hot but with precaution food comes out so good!! I had read reviews about food tasting like plastic, in my case it didn't on the first try food tasted delicious!! Love our pizza nights!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Cooks bottom too fast, keeps the moisture in too much
customer_reviews.text: Cooked my pizzas super fast...under 10-15 min total which was nice. The main downside I found out was the bottom would always brown too fast and the top would still be white ish...not uncooked, but not golden brown yet. The way the lid goes on keeps too much of the steam moisture inside (moisture that would usually evaporate off the top if using a regular oven) so the top of the pizza doesn't turn out that amazing. But overall very fun to use and definitely see this as saving more energy than a traditional oven, so I'll keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! Super easy to clean. This is the 2nd one I have purchased. I bought one last year for the camper but it kept being brought into the house for quick use instead of starting the oven on hot days. So now we have 2 one for the house and one for the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: never leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: this has been a staple on our kitchen counter for many years now, and for good reason. from eggs to waffles to pizza to franks to hamburgers, there's almost nothing this powerhouse can't do. and cleanup is a breeze! thank you, betty!! you "crock"!
customer_reviews.author: awesumthensum

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I love in my rv and this summer heat had me nkt wanting to cook but you put a pizza in this and it cooks fast without getting your kitchen hot, pizza turned out perfectly i love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Vegaslife

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at the start of May and yesterday (July 16) it broke. It lasted less than three months and broke shortly after the return window ended. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Even the kids can make their own snacks
customer_reviews.text: Comes in really handy, my dog chewed the back off the first one I owned and we learned quickly we couldn't live without/o it. It can do just about anything, I have never been able to make perfect pancakes until I owned this.
customer_reviews.author: Kattee

customer_reviews.title: Works for some recipes
customer_reviews.text: Burns everything before the top is cooked because it doesn't have a heat switch so you can change the temperature so pizza is not good to cook on it but nachos works well if you put tin foil on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance that will enhance your cooking skills!
customer_reviews.text: Love this appliance!!! And wish I’d had it years ago. It’s very efficient follow the little cook Book that comes with the appliance and you’ll have a great dish in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Valued customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this gadget
customer_reviews.text: My family has been using this pretty heavy since we got it (12/19) and we just love it! We have used it for omelets, cookies and pizza. We use it to cook low carb chicken crust pizza and it does great. Clean up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family Gift for Pizza During “Stay at Home Orders”
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of the Betty Crocker pizza maker and it saves us from heating up the oven. It’s a great gift for the family during our stay at home orders due to the pandemic. I tried it on a mini pizza (crust ready-to-bake) to get started. I added sauce and cheese. The crust was crunchy and the cheese was hot and bubbly after six minutes. The frozen pizza was just right after 16 minutes. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FJ Hartman

product_meta.title: Betty Crocker BC-2958CR Pizza Maker, 1440 Watts, Red, 2.3, Metal
product_meta.description: For fast, delicious pizza, this pizza maker is a great choice. It's not just for pizza, though - make quesadillas, nachos, mini frittatas, quiche, croissants, giant cookies, hors d'oeuvres and more. The nonstick coated baking plate bakes the crust to perfection and makes cleanup easy. Don't worry about turning on an oven next time you want pizza. Just reach for this pizza maker. 1440 Watts
feature_bullets: Perfect For Quesadillas, Nachos, Mini Frittatas, Quiche, Croissants, Giant Cookies, Hors D'oeuvres & More
Fast, Fun & Energy Efficient. Dishwasher safe- no
Bakes 12" Pizzas With A Deliciously Crispy Crust
Nonstick Coated Baking Plate Bakes Crust To Perfection & Makes Clean Up Easy
Bakes Fresh Homemade Pizzas Or Flatbreads With Favorite Toppings Without Even Turning On An Oven

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,896 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
